attributes.review: I wanted to be able to get news from our glorious leader himself but it was so glitchy it managed to almost break my phone as much as I love our glorious leader I say that any one who is has this app to delete it and anyone considering getting it to click off as fast you can
attributes.title: What a mess

attributes.review:
As soon as i open the app i see a bright orange man, my child starts screaming she thinks Garfield has  turned evil. i try to calm her down but the face just kept scaring her!  instead of voting trump 2020 vote Kim Namjoon and save your child from being traumatized 
“no matter who you are, where you’re from, your skin colour, gender identity just speak yourself -Kim Namjoon 
KIK NAMJOON FOR PRESIDENT 2020💜😤
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: If I could I would give this app 0 stars! I love Cheetos so I thought this app would give me the best recommendations but unfortunately it only showed me the worst one! How dare they discriminate all the other Cheetos! I honestly am so surprised that the App Store still has this up. I would be embarrassed to promote such a misleading discriminatory app!
attributes.title: Horrible App!

attributes.review: For some reason as soon as I opened the app, it crashed. Soon after, all my photos were deleted out of nowhere and my phone was glitching about like nobody’s business. I wouldn’t recommend downloading this app if you have photos that you cherish.
attributes.title: This app is worse than tik tok

attributes.review: This app took SO long to download. I was trying to look through the aMaZing features this app has and was unfortunately LET DOWN. I am disappointed and this app is horrible. Would not recommend. It would also glitch, my screen would go blank, and it’s just a horrible app!
attributes.title: TRUMP IS A P3D0

attributes.review: So I got the app bc I hate trump so when I opened it I saw the orange standing there and it made my so uncomfortable I wanted to puke so I went to Burger King to get a McFlurry but it was hot so I had to put it in the microwave so then I went to McDonald’s to get a whopper but it was cold but when I opened my fridge I saw a Cheeto but it wasn’t a hot one so yea never get this app !!!
attributes.title: I saw a Cheeto

attributes.review: I can’t even with this app I just wanted to have a place we’re I could talk with my fellow conservatives because those snowflake liberals hurt my feelings, but all I saw was an orange donkey!!! Donkeys are the face of the people who want to take away our M19s, we are the proud elephants in red! Not the cheetahs in Orange!!!
attributes.title: Ugh I wanted to support a politician but all I saw was a Cheeto

attributes.review: every time i open the app it shows me pictures of an orange wrinkly pig! and it kept showing me racist homophobic propaganda! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!! apple please remove this from the app store it is very offensive and inappropriate. anyways 𝓫𝓮𝔂𝓮𝓮𝓼 🐝✨sometimes🤨i😾dont❌wanna🐲be😩happy😀dont🚫hold🤕it👻against😨me😡if🤯i’m😰down⬇️just😢leave⚡️me🙈there🐸let🔅me👩🏽‍🦯be💅🏻sad🙁
attributes.title: just horrible

attributes.review: Oh my word this is the most disgusting app I’ve ever seen. I open it only to find graphic pornographic images! I tried to swipe away or something to get it off the screen but then it froze my whole phone!!! Absolutely terrible. Wish I could give it -5 stars
attributes.title: Disgusting and glitchy

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to see a brighter future for the country. I have never been more disappointed... what was i thinking??? Keep app to stay up to date with killing off minorities, poor people, and immigrants and finding excuses for every wrong move to be seen in good light
attributes.title: Horrible App
